message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start!
Not bad, but I want a bit more!

Still a bit too little for me!
Getting closer! I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!

Almost there! I'll give you a bit more, but not too much more!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!

This is my last chance, Alice. Take it or we both lose!
